channel.title: Need Some SCAR Help
channel.description:
Ok when i find someones SCAR script, what exactly do i do to get it working?
example... http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,11420.0.html[br][size=1]Posted at: December 04, 2006, 09:07:11 PM[/size][hr]can any1 help plz?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 04, 2006, 09:15:47 PM[/size][hr]........any1?[br][size=1]Posted at: December 04, 2006, 09:20:33 PM[/size][hr]:([br][size=1]Posted at: December 04, 2006, 09:22:45 PM[/size][hr]ok 10 views and nobody knows what to do... im sure someone does, can u just plz help me?

item.title: Need Some SCAR Help
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Ok, there should be about 4 plugins in the ‘move these plugins’ ( or something like that ) folder, go into that. Highlight all of them, then right-click -> Copy. Then, go into Scar 2.03/Plugins and paste them into there. Then the script should work.

Read full topic

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some SCAR Help
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

I don’t think it’s the script, make sure you downloaded SRL 3.5 and installed it correctly, if you didn’t, then try re-downloading it. If you still have a problem, post.

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some SCAR Help
item.dc:creator: @norrathx18 norrathx18
item.description:
@norrathx18 wrote:

heres the Script im using…

[code]program retardedwillowcutter;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/Skill/WoodCutting.scar}
{Akuma’s WillowCutter for Draynor Willows}
{Start with axe equipped, and an empty inventory}
{Start at the willows outside the bank}
{No bankpins or enter before using}

const
treecolor = 5337208;//Color of the tree
treecolor2 = 2836559;//Another color of the tree
waittime = 15000;// Amount of time to wait (1000 = 1 second)]

//Dont Touch Below\

var
loads:integer;

procedure progrressrepoort;
begin
AddToReport(‘Akumas Willow Cutter’);
AddToReport(’------------------------’);
AddToReport(‘Have cut and banked ’ + inttostr(loads) +’ Loads’);
AddToReport(’------------------------’);
AddToReport(‘Happy Cheating’);
end;

procedure Chopemupie; //chopping procedure
begin
repeat
if(findcolorspiral(x,y,treecolor,3,3,515,336)) or
(findcolorspiral(x,y,treecolor2,3,3,515,336)) then
Mmouse(x,y,3,3)
Wait(200+random(500))
if (istextat2(x,y,‘Chop’,5) = true) then
Wait(1000+random(500))
Mouse(x,y,2,2,true)
Wait(waittime+random(2000))
until(invfull)
end;

procedure Bankmelogs; //banking procedure
begin
if FindSymbol(X,y,‘bank’) then
Mouse(x,y,5,5,true);
Flag;
Openbank;
wait(1000+random(611))
DepositAll;
Mouse(423, 36, 67, 10, true);
loads := loads + 1;
end;

procedure Antishit; //antirans
begin
FindEnt(TreeColor);
FindNormalRandoms;
end;

procedure totrees;
begin
Mmouse(670, 133,3,3)
wait(500+random(210))
mouse(x,y,0,0,true);
if FindSymbol(X,y,‘fishing spot’) then
Mouse(x,y,5,5,true);
Flag;
end;

begin
SetupSRL;
Face(‘e’)
antishit;
repeat
Chopemupie;
antishit;
Bankmelogs;
antishit;
progrressrepoort;
totrees;
until(false)
end.[/code]

Read full topic

item.title: Need Some SCAR Help
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

Are you sure you have SRL 3.5? Because that should move the plugins for you.

Oh, would it have something to do with the fact that your error doesn’t have any slashes in the path?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @norrathx18 norrathx18
item.description:

ok i copied the Script i wanted into scar but i get these errors… any solutions?

Include file C:Program FilesSCAR 2.03includesSRL/SRL.scar does not exist.
Include file C:Program FilesSCAR 2.03includesSRL/SRL/Skill/WoodCutting.scar does not exist.
Failed when compiling[br][size=1]Posted at: December 05, 2006, 03:38:18 PM[/size][hr]ok i fixed that error lol, now i have this one

Line 438: [Error] (11006:1): Unknown identifier ‘ProcessPicture’ in script C:Program FilesSCAR 2.03includessrlsrlcoreAntiRandoms.scar

Quote the script and then copy it from the quote box. That will work.

OR!

Get Firefox
